data.eml:eml: Nicaraguan Pipunculidae (Diptera): new records and description of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rafael, José Albertino, Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2004): Nicaraguan Pipunculidae (Diptera): new records and description of new species. Zootaxa 529: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157708
